Name: Snowman Hat: Honored Guest
Desc: An opulent formal hat. Can be used to build a Puffy Snowman.\nSuch top hats are usually part of an adult man's formal wear, intended for evening balls of great pomp and ceremony. Snowmen who wear such hats often play the role of a VIP in children's games. However, some cleanup work will be required afterward before the children can return these hats to their fathers. For example, the removal of broken snow and water stains...
